pkgmetadata.longdescription: Simulate and Visualize the Gaussian Puff Forward Atmospheric Model // Simulate and run the Gaussian puff forward atmospheric model in sensor (specific sensor coordinates) or grid (across the grid of a full oil and gas operations site) modes, following Jia, M., Fish, R., Daniels, W., Sprinkle, B. and Hammerling, D. (2024) doi:10.26434/chemrxiv-2023-hc95q-v3. Numerous visualization options, including static and animated, 2D and 3D, and a site map generator based on sensor and source coordinates.
